title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Seamless data sharing in Amazon Redshift (ANT348)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Redshift 中的无缝数据共享 (ANT348)
abstract: Data copying is time-consuming and can introduce errors and consistency issues. Organizations are looking for an easy way to share data in a well-governed way across accounts, AWS Regions, partners, and vendors. Join this lightning talk to learn how to easily and securely share live data across Amazon Redshift clusters.
abstract_cn: 数据复制耗时且可能引入错误和一致性问题。组织正在寻找一种简单的方法，以良好治理的方式跨账户、AWS 区域、合作伙伴和供应商共享数据。加入本次闪电演讲，了解如何轻松安全地跨 Amazon Redshift 集群共享实时数据。
